body.name: DeerValley DV-1F52812 Modern Small One-Piece Toilet, Compact Bathroom Tiny Mini Commode Water Closet Dual Flush Concealed (White)
features: ✅ [Stylish and Personalized Design] : Contemporary and one-piece design, exactly what you are looking for. Perfectly suitable for your modern design bathroom.
✅ [Highly Efficient Dual-Flush] : 1.28 GPF for full flush (adjustable with floater) /0.8 GPF for half flush with a powerful flush system. It has two flush options and both are water-saving features.
✅ [Suprior Quality Seat]: With soft closing and push button removable design, this toilet seat makes easy to get off and will never disturb your family.
✅ [Space Saver]: It is a little smaller than a standard toilet. Actually, it’s a perfect size unless you’re an extremely large person. It is a wonderful small toilet for water closets.

✅ [All-in-one packge]: Package Includes toilet, pre-installed soft closing toilet seat, pre-installed water fitting , high quality wax ring , floor bolts , and installation instruction, also Include special hand wrench tool to easily tighten the bolts in narrow spaces.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: DeerValley Small compact toilet Short One Piece Toilet Tiny White Water Closet for Small Bathrooms This toilet toilet is smaller and shorter than a standard toilet, so it perfectly fits for small bathrooms. The toilet seat is 2” shorter than a standard elongated toilet seat. Water Conversation with Dual Flush Feature A dual flush toilet drives lower water usage in your home, thereby saving money on your monthly water bill. Siphon flushing one piece toilet with fully glazed flush system allows you to proactively conserve water by selecting 0.8 GPF or higher for tougher jobs. EASY TO INSTALL WITH ALL-IN-ONE PACKAGE Two big installation access on the side allows plumber to install this modern toilet much easier.Package Includes one piece toilet, pre-installed soft closing toilet seat, pre-installed water fitting , wax ring , floor bolts and installation instruction. SOFT CLOSING TOILET SEAT Soft closing toilet seat for this small toilet closes slowly and quietly,will never disturb your family.It’s available for attaching a bidet when you are ready to upgrade.

This toilet will come with a supply line connector(adapter) for you to connect the supply line and toilet. If your supply line size is 1/2", you could directly connect your water line to the toilet. If your supply line size is 7/8", please screw off the adapter, then connect it. There are two choices for you to replace your seat. One is made of plastic and the other is made of Urea-Formaldehyde which is texture hard, non-toxic, and environmental protection. The part number is DV-1F812S11 and DV-1F812S21 respectively. Compared to two-piece toilets, it has no corners and grooves and is very easy to reach for cleaning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very conveniente and practicle, we're please!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install. One piece toilet is the way to go. Awesome.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice smaller toilet
reviews.reviewText: We had a huge toilet in our bathroom. The previous owner was over 6 ft tall. My husband and I are 5’7” and below. He hated the taller toilet. So he ordered this one. It is the perfect size for us and fits more comfortably in the nook between 2 walls in the bathroom. It was easy to install. Very easy to clean. We love the dual push button flush. I took a star from it only because of the toilet seat. After so many uses, it has a habit of coming loose and having to be tightened down again. This can be a real pain if you don’t know it has come loose and sit down on it and it slides toward one side or the other.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Grade A customer service
reviews.reviewText: The toilet is great but the customer service is amazing. I had an issue with the toilet. I sent them a message and they responded and not even a day later. It was amazing customer service and I love the toilet. I would definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice looking space saving toilet
reviews.reviewText: Small toilet with modern design, perfect for a small bathroom. Powerful, yet quiet duel flush. Easy to clean. Space saver. Water saver. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this Quiet, Good Flusher, Water-saving Throne
reviews.reviewText: This toilet moved the sitting position an additional 5" from the door of our small powder-room so you don't feel like your face is right against it. It installs easily (no tank bolts, gasket, etc.) and light enough to position over the floor bolts. It flushes very well and with a very small amount of water, and the refill is very quick and quiet. I'm so glad we bought it.I was worried the ceramic might be cracked or broken during shipment, but it was totally encased in a styrofoam case inside the package. I think the handlers could drop it from ten feet and it wouldn't break.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars bad toilet seat and flush doesn't clean entire bowl
reviews.reviewText: Want to replace seat but it looks glued on instead of standard seat mounting.Flush is single stream instead of full bowl flush so you end up having to clean bowl very often.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Too small look like a kid toilet
